verbs.description: [ARG1: russia] [V: appears] [C-ARG1: to be building up its military bases near a weak point in the nato alliance] satellite imagery appears to show activity around military bases in russia baltic sea exclave of kaliningrad in the months leading up to a summit between donald trump and vladimir putin russian air force poland lithuania russia matt hall nato baltic kaliningrad dalia grybauskaitė
